statements.insert:
select SEQ_SM_LPRCAMERA_INFO.nextval as IntId from dual
insert into SM_LPRCamera_Info ( I_IntId, C_LPRFactory, C_LPRSpec, C_LPRModel, C_LPRIP1, C_LPRIP2, I_LPRChannelNum, I_LPRStorage, C_LPRUserName, C_LPRPassword, C_LPRPort, C_CREATETIME, C_CREATEUSER ) values ( #IntId#, #LPRFactory#, #LPRSpec#, #LPRModel#, #LPRIP1#, #LPRIP2#, #ChannelNum#, #Storage#, #Username#, #Password#, #Port#, to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss'), #createUser# )
statements.update: update SM_LPRCamera_Info set C_LPRFactory = #LPRFactory#, C_LPRSpec = #LPRSpec#, C_LPRModel=#LPRModel#, C_LPRIP1=#LPRIP1#, C_LPRIP2=#LPRIP2#, I_LPRChannelNum=#ChannelNum#, C_LPRUserName=#Username#, C_LPRPassword=#Password#, C_LPRPort=#Port#, I_LPRStorage=#Storage#, C_UpdateTime=to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss'), C_UpdateUser=#updateUser# where I_IntId = #IntId#
statements.select: select a.I_IntId, a.C_LPRFactory, a.C_LPRSpec, a.C_LPRModel, a.C_LPRIP1, a.C_LPRIP2, a.I_LPRChannelNum, a.I_LPRStorage, a.C_LPRUserName, a.C_LPRPassword, a.C_LPRPort, a.C_CREATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME from SM_LPRCamera_Info a order by a.C_CREATETIME desc

select a.I_IntId, a.C_LPRFactory, a.C_LPRSpec, a.C_LPRModel, a.C_LPRIP1, a.C_LPRIP2, a.I_LPRChannelNum, a.I_LPRStorage, a.C_LPRUserName, a.C_LPRPassword, a.C_LPRPort, a.C_CREATEUSER, a.C_CREATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME from SM_LPRCamera_Info a where a.C_LPRFactory=#value# order by a.C_CREATETIME desc

select a.I_IntId, a.C_LPRFactory, a.C_LPRSpec, a.C_LPRModel, a.C_LPRIP1, a.C_LPRIP2, a.I_LPRChannelNum, a.I_LPRStorage, a.C_LPRUserName, a.C_LPRPassword, a.C_LPRPort, a.C_CREATEUSER, a.C_CREATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME from SM_LPRCamera_Info a where a.C_LPRIP1=#LPRIP1# order by a.C_CREATETIME desc

select a.I_IntId, a.C_LPRFactory, a.C_LPRSpec, a.C_LPRModel, a.C_LPRIP1, a.C_LPRIP2, a.I_LPRChannelNum, a.I_LPRStorage, a.C_LPRUserName, a.C_LPRPassword, a.C_LPRPort, a.C_CREATEUSER, a.C_CREATEUSER, a.C_CREATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSER, a.C_UPDATETIME from SM_LPRCamera_Info a where a.I_IntId=#value#
